thread.title: Mikko Ruostila
thread.title_full: Travellink Vapaa-ajan matkat arvostelun kirjoitti Mikko Ruostila

author: Mikko Ruostila
title: Mikko Ruostila
text: Fast search, good prices and overall trustworthy. Still some room for improvement with the search, though: Searching with prices including check-in luggage and nearby dates would make the process a whole lot faster and more transparent.
